enhanced_by.reason: Both methods require a 'productId' and 'autoSubscribe' parameter, making it easy to reuse setup logic.
Both methods involve operations on flexible products, suggesting similar state changes that can be tested together.
The 'flexibleSubscriptionRecord' method can be used to verify the subscription records after setting auto-subscribe, ensuring the operation was successful.
The 'flexibleProductPosition' method can be used to verify the updated product position after setting auto-subscribe, ensuring the state has changed as expected.
